metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: Learn how to create a progress bar using JavaScript.
content.html: Learn how to create a progress bar using JavaScript.

content.code_html:
<div id="myProgress">
  <div id="myBar"></div>
</div>

#myProgress {
  width: 100%;
  background-color: grey;
}

#myBar {
  width: 1%;
  height: 30px;
  background-color: green;
}

content.text: Create a Dynamic Progress Bar (animated) Using JavaScript:
content.html: Create a Dynamic Progress Bar (animated) Using JavaScript:

content.code_html:
var i = 0;
function move() {
  if (i == 0) {
    i = 1;
    var elem = document.getElementById("myBar");
    var width = 1;
    var id = setInterval(frame, 10);
    function frame() {
      if (width >= 100) {
        clearInterval(id);
        i = 0;
      } else {
        width++;
        elem.style.width = width + "%";
      }
    }
  }
}

content.text: If you want to add labels to indicate how far the user is in the process, add a new element inside (or outside) the progress bar:
content.html: If you want to add labels to indicate how far the user is in the process, add a new element inside (or outside) the progress bar:

content.code_html:
<div id="myProgress">
  <div id="myBar">10%</div>
</div>

syntaxHighlighting.text: /* To center it horizontally (if you want) */

syntax_highlighting.text: /* To center it horizontally (if you want) */

content.code_html:
#myBar {
  width: 10%;
  height: 30px;
  background-color: #04AA6D;
  text-align: center; /* To center it horizontally (if you want) */
  line-height: 30px; /* To center it vertically */
  color: white;
}

syntax_highlighting_data.text: /* To center it horizontally (if you want) */

content.text: If you want to dynamically update the text inside the label to the same value of the width of the progress bar, add the following:
content.html: If you want to dynamically update the text inside the label to the same value of the width of the progress bar, add the following:

content.code_html:
var i = 0;
function move() {
  if (i == 0) {
    i = 1;
    var elem = document.getElementById("myBar");
    var width = 10;
    var id = setInterval(frame, 10);
    function frame() {
      if (width >= 100) {
        clearInterval(id);
        i = 0;
      } else {
        width++;
        elem.style.width = width + "%";
        elem.innerHTML = width + "%";
      }
    }
  }
}
